text: @realDonaldTrump 🤦🏻‍♂️ I used to say idiot for you since at the beginning of Covid-19 case bcoz of your silly actions, I wanna apologise from idiots after I see your tweet, What the hell are you talking about ? any relation could be Biden and Covid-19 ? Are you serious ? I hope you are kidding idiot
